name: THE FALL OF BJøRN
description:
~Welcome~
in the fallen kingdom Bjorn. You'll meet three different and unique characters with a special ability. In each level you get task to complete.

We offer ~8~ levels, in these levels, you will face mystical guards and their little rats.

Story:

the father of the three brothers after his death his left hand ordered his Guards to kill the 3 brothers so he can take controll of the kingdom, in the game you will try escape from the castle you prisoned in.
